overview:
Runs skill-based competitions like award programs, idea competitions, innovation prizes for corporations, foundations, non-profits and government. Developed automated software platform (Challenge Accelerator) that administers the prize process.

Company has run innovation prizes for Red Hat, HopeLab Foundation, Hilton Hotels, American Express, Harley-Davidson, Lexmark, Shell, IBM, Sprint, Whirlpool, Abu Dhabi’s Masdar City and others.

Been featured in Business 2.0, Inc., Chicago Tribune, LeMonde, Les Echos, BNET, ZDNET, Continental Airlines magazines, books like “We are Smarter than Me” by Wharton Publishing.
